name: Preparing for reuse
description: Giving the products a second life before they become waste.

name: Recycling
description: Any recovery operation by which waste materials are reprocessed into products, materials or substances whether for the original or other purposes. It includes composting and it does not include incineration.

name: Recovery
description: Some waste incineration based on a political non-scientific formula that upgrades the less inefficient incinerators.

name: Disposal
description: Processes to dispose of waste be it landfilling, incineration, pyrolisis, gasification and other finalist solutions.
